title: National Programme for Rehabilitation of Persons with Disabilities (NPRPD)
description: The aim of the scheme is to extend financial assistance to the NGOs, Trusts and Institutions working for the cause of Persons with Disabilities.

title: Issuing of Identity Cards to Disabled Persons
Unemployment Allowance to Disabled Persons
description: The aim of the scheme is to given unemployment allowance to the unemployed Handicapped Person waiting for the employment for unduly long period and belongs to poor section of the society and required to be assisted till their gainful employment. The eligibility criteria under the scheme is as under:-

title: Inter-Caste Marriage
description: To remove caste consciousness among the people and to encourage inter-caste marriage.
eligibility:
Age criteria of marriage as per law; (presently, 18 years for the bride and 21 years for the bridegroom).
Resident should be Citizens Of India and permanent residents of UT Chandigarh..
One of the spouses should belong to Schedule Caste family.
Only for the first marriage.
requiredDocuments:
Scheduled Caste certificate.
Marriage Registration certificate.
Residence proof of three years (Voter Card, Ration Card etc).
Aadhar Card.
Date of Birth proof of Husband & Wife both.
Post Card size photograph of marriage.
Affidavit (shown stay in Chandigarh, Age & Caste of both husband and wife) whether first marriage, certified incentive has not taken earlier.

title: Financial Assistance for the Marriage of Daughters of Widows/Destitute Women belonging to the Scheduled Caste
description: To provide financial assistance for meeting the marriage expenses of daughters of widow/ destitute women belonging to Schedule Caste.
eligibility:
Mother of the Bride should belong to the Scheduled Caste community.
The assistance is admissible for the marriage of two daughters in a family.
Girl should be at least be 18 years of age on the date of marriage.
For the first marriage only.
Family income should not exceed Rs. 2000/- p.m. (To be verified by the Tehsildar)
Resident of UT, Chandigarh for more than 3 years.
If both the parents of the bride are dead, the legal guardian will be entitled to this assistance

title: National Family Benefit Scheme
description: To provide financial assistance to the family on the death of Bread Winner.
eligibility:
Family living Below Poverty Line.
The age limit of the deceased should be 18-59 years death on or after 18.10.2012 & age limit of the deceased should be 18-64 yrs death before 18.10.2012
Resident of UT, Chandigarh for last three years.

title: The Financial Assistance To Dependent Children of Widows And Destitute Women
description: To extend financial assistance to such children who are fatherless or whose parents (both mother and father) have died.
eligibility:
The Children of widow and destitute women under 18 years of age who have been deprived of parental no support or care after their parent's death or continued absence from home.
Whose mother is getting pension from Social Welfare Department under the scheme of financial assistance to widow and destitute women.
Children who have been given institutional care by government/NGO shall not be eligible for financial assistance.
If parents of child have died, the assistance will be provided to legal guardian.
Resident of UT, Chandigarh for more than 3 years.
The Child/Children is/are not in receipt of family pension from any State/Central Govt.

title: Petrol Subsidy To Persons With Disability
Pension To The Disabled Persons
description: - Disability pension to disabled person is granted to Physically Handicapped person. Persons who are disabled to the extent of 40% and are residents of Union Territory of Chandigarh and fulfill the income criteria i.e. family income does not exceed Rs.1.50 lacs p.a. are eligible for grant of pension. The quantum of assistance is as under

title: Pension To Widows And Destitute Women
description: To provide financial assistance to Widows and Destitute Women.
eligibility:
The women of age group 18-60.
Resident of UT, Chandigarh for more than 3 years.
Monthly family income of the applicant should not exceed Rs. 1.50 lacs annually.
requiredDocuments:
Residence proof of three years (Voter Card, Ration Card, Electricity Bill etc).
Death certificate of husband (In case of widow).
Aadhar Card.
Mobile Number.

title: Old Age Pension
description: To provide financial assistance to elderly people.
eligibility:
Monthly family income of the applicant should not exceed Rs. 1.50 lacs annually.
Resident of UT, Chandigarh for more than 3 years.
Age 60 years and above.
requiredDocuments:
Two passport size photographs.
Residence proof of three years (Voter Card, Ration Card, Electricity Bill etc).
Aadhar Card.
Mobile Number.

title: Sponsorship Scheme -A financial assistance to promote family based care with a view to improve the quality of life of children
description: Sponsorship is the provision of supplementary support to families to meet the needs of their children to improve their quality of life. The focus of the scheme is to promote family based care & deinstitutionalization of children with financial support of Rs. 4000/- pm per child. Benefits under sponsorship scheme will be provided for maximum upto 18 years of age.

title: Foster Care Scheme
description: Foster Care Scheme; “Be a Foster Parent-  Foster  a Child, Foster Dreams”

title: PARVARISH scheme for the development of children affected/orphaned due to COVID.
description: To ensure holistic development of children affected/orphaned due to COVID and to provide an additional & comprehensive support for their well being.
